about_the_game:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                          

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Player's soul has been split into 2 and it's the job of the player to get the souls back together. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for an nice gamejam called: The Hyper Unicorn GameJam. With 3 themes to choose out, I choose bound together. I hope you like the game and have fun with it and don't forget to stay awesome.

If there's any bugs within the game or suggestions in the game, You can always send it within the reviews here down below, and I will try to apply it as soon as possible to make the experience much better for the player.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                        

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Like any other platformers, you have the usual jumping, dashing and also hanging unto walls. But throughout the play sessions, you will also have other little things, like Gravity changing platforms, Automatic Jumping Platforms, Teleport Platforms and Shrinking Platforms.

The player also has to avoid other certain obstacles like spikes, lava, bullet pallets from turrets and even the Corrupt Souls. 

Corrupted Souls are the souls that didn't make it, and had their souls not be set to one in time, or an part of their very soul died, and would make them corrupted. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

name: Split Souls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, or Windows 10 (64-bit recommended)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent (dual-core, 3.0 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better, or any graphics card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) | Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD equivalent (quad-core, 3.2 GHz or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850 with 1 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated sound card

short_description: The Player's soul has been split into 2 and it's the job of the player to get the souls back together.
